tool.name: OGS: createLayeredMeshFromRasters
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'createLayeredMeshFromRasters'.
tool.command: createLayeredMeshFromRasters $ascii_output --thickness '$thickness' #for $f in $raster_list: #echo str($f) >> "raster_list_list.txt" #end for --raster-list 'raster_list_list.txt' $keep_surface_material_ids #for $f in $input_mesh_file: --input-mesh-file '$f' #end for --output-mesh-file output_1.vtu

param.name: ascii_output
param.label: ascii output
param.help: Write VTU output in ASCII format.

param.name: thickness
param.label: thickness
param.help: The minimum thickness of a layer to be integrated at any given

param.name: raster_list
param.label: raster list
param.help: Input (.vtu). An ascii-file containing a list of input

param.name: keep_surface_material_ids
param.label: keep surface material ids
param.help: if the argument is present the materials defined in the surface mesh

param.name: input_mesh_file
param.label: input mesh file
param.help: Input (.vtu). The file name of the 2D input mesh

tool.help: This tool runs the **createLayeredMeshFromRasters** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
